reviews.review:
Plusy: Příběh,Prostředí ,atmosféra,Elisabeth,Konec,voda
Mínusy:Akční pasáže,v půlce hry se dostaví stereotyp,občas grafika

80%
Un FPS original avec un très bon scénario, plus couloir que bioshock 1 et 2, mais aussi plus nerveux et tout aussi immersif !
Return to Rapture

This game is a joy despite it's few, concentrated faults. I enthusiastically plowed through it in under a week. Two thumbs up.

Setting: The magical floating early 20th century sky city is gorgeous and engaging. Zeppelin powered barber shop quartet! I'm in.

Plot: The ol' idiot protagonist trick? Surely there are better ways to push the story along than to force my playable character into making incredibly stupid decisions.

Combat: Zoom slide smash explode stun shoot punch hide. Fantastic! My mouse is malformed from all the squeezing.

Plot: Parallel dimensions AND time travel? Be still my heart. Hi, I have infinite power over time and space. Want another crane hook?

Cleavage: *** SPOILER ALERT *** a) That's your mother's corset. b) I'm your father. c) Nice try, Bioshock, but thanks to the stellar combat I already had an erection!

Plot: I swear to Comstock, if I have to climb out of this row boat one more time....

I would have enjoyed this game more if I'd shut it down immediately after the final battle. The 15 minute trudge through the ending sequence was not enjoyable. I don't need my MacGuffins explained, especially by way of someone's ass.

Probably THE best FPS I ever played! If you just like to mindlessly kill enemies, this is NOT for you. Bioshock is a nice game, but the main enjoyement is from the story. This game does not only make references to psychology, but to philosophy too, mainly about human choices and their consequences. The character developpment is really well done, at the end of the game you will have feelings for all the main characters : joy, sadness, pity, anger, etc. And the ending... mind blowing! Very well writen story that makes you feel like you are there!

However, the gameplay is really fun too! I think it's nice that they go for a different style of FPS which has a rpg feel to it, and there is a mix of platformer too. 

Definitely in my top 10 best games of all time!
Лучшая игра этого года. Лучшая часть из всех версий Bioshock. Легкая, захватывающая и удивительно цельная.

Simply amazing, one of the best experiences of my entire life, quite possibly my favorite game of all time :3

DLC's:
Burial at Sea Part 1 and 2 are in my opinion the best DLC's i have ever experienced. Part one is short but really sweet, with a really cool cliffhanger ending and Part 2 just ties all the lose ends left by Bioshock Infinite and Part 1, and ends with a huge connection to the original Bioshock. Awesome <3

"-Booker, are you afraid of god? 
 -No, but I'm afraid of you..."

Infinite, the absolute "down under" regarding its predecesor! (ironic hint: city in the clouds).
No Aussies though just Songbird, Blood, Elizabeth, food for Thought and the whole Universe.
I love this Game!! Can't wait for "Burial at the Sea" !!

Bioshock series: "Ayn Rand is our villain."
Also Bioshock series: 1.414 billion dollar valuation.
One of the best games i ever played!

Красивая, сочная графика пускает пыль в глаза по началу игры. Со временем игра становится очень однообразной, в плоть до того что просто пробегаешь локации особо не задумываясь о здоровье ГГ, идешь на пролом (все равно не убьют). Играть стоит только любителям франчайз частей данной игры. Но! Концовка очень порадовала. Необычная, вот чего чего, а такого не ожидал.

Verdammt gut! Muss man gespielt haben, wenn auch die hohen Schwierigkeitsstufen das game eher zu einer Quälerei machen. Aber es verdreht einem in jedweder Hinsicht den Kopf! Und das Ende ist der HAMMER!

Storyline level: A-FREAKIN'-MAZING! a litle complicated but its gonna blow your mind!
The graphics are really good so be sure to have a nice set-up if you wanna play this.
took me around 11 hours to complete this game so its safe to say that it will take some of your time to complete it.
Great game! Great story! Realy good action. Play it on hard. Then you need to use all the vigors and weapons. 9 out of 10 for me.
Yeah Nathan Drake's character really evolves in this game.

Jeux magnifique grâce à l'Unreal 3 :P
Scénario vraiment sympa....et cette fin....j'ai jamais vu une fin comme celle-là où je suis resté bouche-bée, même dans un film....rien que la fin est une raison nécessaire pour absolument le faire...
Le personnage d'Elizabeth est vraiment super attachant, et j'adore son évolution tout au long du jeu.
Un énorme coup de cœur <3
19/20

Edit : J'ai fini les DLC et ils sont un excellent lien avec le 1 et le 2, il approfondissent l'histoire du jeu et j'ai beaucoup aimé.
The ending will blow your mind.

Utter peice of garbage. DeWitt is really Comstock from an alternate reality that is somehow older because they can also timetravel somehow and elizabeth is his daughter. And a bunch of  alternate timeline/reality Elizabeths drown DeWitt to stop comstock from ever existing.  No, it doesn't make sense. I only wish Elizabeth could drown ken levine in every possible  timeline to prevent this peice of crap from ever existing.

Wow. Just wow. This game was incredible.

From the graphics to the story then to the subtle animations they did for Elizabeth, it completely blew my mind. The game wasn't particularly long (or I just went through it a little fast) but for the ~15hrs in it, it is well worth it.

You can tell they put a lot of time and effort into this game and it totally paid off. More games need to be this well done. If they had a second game set in the same world and another epic story, I would buy it in a heart beat.
Best of 2013.

I fell in love with this in a different way I fell in love with the other Bioshocks. Infinite is beautiful. The story is beautiful. The characters are beautiful. The scenery is beautiful. I'm deeply in love with this game and everything that was put into it.

A great game. Amazing, even. This shooter is incredible, with a beautifully written story, and voice-acting so good that you never feel out of the moment. Elizabeth is a delightful ally throughout the game, and the powers you get are pretty dope.

But here's the drawbacks: There's so few powers compared to Bioshock 1 & 2, and you're now limited to carrying two weapons at a time. It's a damn shame, tbh. The removal of some RPG elements is a sad time.

But the game is still well worth it. Especially with the Burial at Sea DLCs.

Very enjoyable. Good story!
Edit 2021: 8 years later and the game is still great. One of the most interesting stories in a FPS Game.
it sucked
ITs just a damm good story. Not the best game. But man its an experience. Ken Levine knoes how to make endings.

I find it sad that the decisions are this game aren't nearly as meaningful as those in Saints Row 3, especially considering that while this game encourages you to immerse yourself and think, Saints Row 3 wants you to smack people in the face with rubber genitalia.

But to be serious, a lot about this game just doesn't work, especially compared to the original Bioshock. Columbia just feels like a big battleground instead of a real city. Handymen feel like they were specifically designed to kill Booker, and the plot makes a lot of handwaves (such as the universe hopping, which just feels like a poorly thought out plot device), and just doesn't work.
It's not a very smart game. It tries to be, but in the end, it feels more like a generic shooter than a game that has some underlying message or deeper meaning.
There's a guy on Youtube called MatthewMatosis, who did a very well thought out critique of this game, and I share a lot of his opinions. There's only so much I can say that he hasn't already.

Burial at Sea is pretty good though.
Beste Story seit Half-Life.

TREMENDO!! Uno de los mejores juegos que jugue en mi vida, ya lo habia jugado hace tiempo y ahora acabo de terminar el dlc burial at sea episodio 1 y es increible, te deja con ganas de jugar YA al episodio 2.. Sin duda uno de los juegos que hay que jugar si o si! 10 puntos, aplausos a los creadores! El juego principal una joya y el dlc no se queda atras, a la espera que salga el segundo episodio..
Быстро и на одном дыхании(возможно коротковата кампашка), приятный движок, АИ нормальный(в том числе и дружественный), отдохнуть на пару вечеров после суровых трудовых будней шахтёра.

Eines der beeindruckensten Spiele überhaupt.
Wer auf Spiele mit packender Atmosphäre und genialer Story steht kommt an Bioshock Infinite nicht vorbei. 

Ein Meilenstein.
Игра просто за душу берет и не отпускает. Пока не пройдешь или уснешь за пк не выключишь ее!

[table]
    [tr]
        [th][h1] My Playthrough [/h1][/th]
        [th][url=https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLTZKn1hLlcQMFXNPFoiWxdQmVctADbQ5v] Youtube Playlist [/url][/th]
    [/tr]
    [tr]
        [td][h1]The Review[/h1][/td]
        [td]The main game gameplay is typical of a FPS but like the original Bioshock you have powers in the form of vigors. But unlike the original Bioshock You can't carry all your weapons and it's much more  linear. The first issue you would notice with the game is that the citizens in this game are set-dressing as they offer nothing and do nothing but stare at you. The story of this game is all over the place and you can tell that it revels in being overly complicated. It's not enough that they involve you going to other universes but also all the universes that are in the game doesn't make sense. For example, at one point in the game you go to a universe where Booker is helping a revolution on Columbia but that  Booker died so though the rest of the game you stay in that universe but yet you don't meet the Elizabeth of that universe. Just some of the bigger plot holes of this game. This game might have been better if Elizabeth was the protagonist and it was a adventure game instead of a fps but who knows.
[/td]
    [/tr]
[/table]
This game is a perfect as a game can get.  You really owe it to yourself to check it out.  One of the three games I would give a 10/10, and my personal pick for GOTY 2013.

One of the most cinematic games I have ever played.  I loved every minute of this game and I definately reccommend this game to anyone who wants an interesting, in depth storyline, and a beautiful, disturbing world to jump into.  But before you pick this game up, play the first game.  If not all the way through, just at least play it.  There are so many ties that Bioshock Infinite has to the original.  However, if you just want to jump right into Bioshock Infinite, you wont be missing any of the important things.  Just playing the first game makes this game so much cooler.  I would wait until its on sale and then pick it up immediately!

Great Game! Has fun gameplay, probably the best so far 2013 besides maybe The Last of Us. The Story is definitely the weakest part of the game, but it is still great and a Must Have for anybody!
9.5/10

This game was, for lack of better words, a total mindfuck. And I loved every minute of it. Aside from the minor annoying design technicalities (lack of variation in npc models, checkpoint saving, etc), this game and its story is one of the best I've experienced in recent times. Definitely a must for any fan of the first two games.

Překrásná hra.
Krásná atmosféra světa, která se dá krájet. 
Grafika, která dodává atmosféře ten správný říz.
Příběh, který mě fakt velmi příjemně překvapil a který se stal jedním z nejlepších jaký jsem kdy prožil s úžasným průběhem a fantastickým koncem.
Parádní sountrack

Co se týká hratelnosti, tak dá se říct, že je to +- obyč. střílečka, ale ve spojitosti s výše uvedenými klady se z toho stává umělecké dílo, které ve Vás opravdu zanechá krásný a hřejivý pocit a také mráz po zádech,protože jste zažili něco jedinečného. Musím říct, že tyhle pocity jsem u hry dlouho nezažil..

Děkuji, že ta hra vyšla...:)))

Pretty fun game once you exclude the "Bioshock" part out of the title. The story for me was a little predictable but it was still a very well written and directed game with a nice new addition of the skyhook for easy movement, even sports evasive and offensive options, some pretty cool vigors (equivalent to plasmids from actual Bioshock titles) to keep the average shooting mechanics interesting and some pretty damn pleasing-to-the-eyes kind of art direction. Other than that, it plays like your standard-fair first-person shooter with a story that, I feel, is the main driving force for playing through the game.

Шедевр. Очень классный сюжет, лучше чем у первой части даже. Первую часть очень ждал, прошел 3 раза, вторая послабее была, а вот третью практически не ждал, делали долго, да и другие игры были. Но результат потрясающий, все сделано в фирменном стиле, даже то что игра вобщем то про тоже, что утопию не построишь не сказывается плохо - все воспринимается не как "опять про тоже самое", а как фишка. Чтобы вкурить все детали сюжета пришлось лезть в википедию, в нем куча нюансов и роль персонажей не всегда до конца понятна. Возвращение в Рапчур на 5 минут - не думал что вызовет такие эмоции, надеюсь DLC будут классными.
Очень рекомендую.

==================
Допишу про Episode 2
==================

10/10 Дополнение на уровне Half Life Episode 2, с той лишь разницей, что это финальная глава серии и финальная игра Irrational games. Левин расставил все точки в сюжете и в сюжетных линиях персонажей - получилось жестоко. Весь второй эпизод пропитан безысходностью, буквально все вокруг говорит - этот город поглотит всех кто в нем живет. Отлично дополняется история Фонтейна и Райана, становиться еще более понятно, почему в оригинальном Биошоке населению так конкретно свернуло крышу - вся монструозность этих двух полностью раскрывается именно здесь. Финал потрясающий и просто опустошительный, продолжения не будет, у Левина хватило яиц сделать именно финал, без всяких лазеек, если кто-то и будет продолжать франшизу - это будет другой Биошок. Изменился и геймплей, теперь это стелс, временами кривоватый, но все равно играбельно, понимаю, Элизабет, палящая и дробовика направо и налево, выглядела бы немного странно. Советую всем, причем советую пройти все с самой первой части, на мой взгляд вторая часть немного выбивается и всего повествования, вся суть содержиться в первой части, Infinite и эпизодах, они и заканчивают линию первого Биошока.
This game is by far the best game I've ever played. The gameplay elements are excellent, the story is immersive, and the character interaction with Elizabeth is fantastic.
Yes Yes Yes ........... spätestens wenn das DLC Buried at Sea rauskommt ein Pflichtkauf.

Как по мне действительно интерестно поднятся со дна морского города, в небо - "в город на воздушных шариках". Честно,я не мог в нее играть больше пару часиков, приходилось делать перерывы в 1,2,а то и в 3 дня, но все таки на самом деле у игры есть все, чтобы в любить в себя любого игрока. Эта игра вышла 26 марта 2013 года и по сей день, тоесть (29 января 14 года) дает борьбу в лидарах по продажам, хоть это и не важный фактор, но все таки, BioShock Infinite заставляет погрузиться в игру с ног до головы, как было в предыдущих сириях BioShock. Разработчики компании Irrational Games, а также 2K Marin, Human Head Studios спасибо вам большое за потрясающию сирию BioShock!!!

9/10

Awesome storyline.
Average graphics.
Very (very) boring and simplyfied gameplay.
Normal difficulty has absolutely no challenge (probably for blind children).

First one in the series I play, and I loved it. The whole atmosphere and way in which the story unfolds got me hooked until the end. And I only experienced one jump scare, which is great as that is why I had been previously neglecting this series.
Great game. The ending will mess with your head.
A solid shooter paired with an intelligent story and a unique setting.

Средняя игра, которая вывозит исключительно из-за сеттинга (хотя это плюс лично для меня, ибо начало 20-го века в Америке - моя любимая эпоха) и концовки. Да, концовка безусловно отличная, неожиданная, все дела. Пробудила во мне какие-никакие чувства, но проходить игру ради коцновки... я бы не советовал. Да и деньги тратить тоже. Моя оценка 7.5/10 (исключительно из-за моей любви к данной эпохе и тому, как её передали в игре (ну и концовке))

It's pretty. We can all agree on that. The story is (a good) different. Otherwise get this game if you enjoyed the previous BioShock titles. It's Christian undertones might not be for everyone.
7/10

Haven't play much only because I have exams coming up but from what I've played I can already say that this is one of the best games I've ever played. The first thing that got me was how beautiful the graphics are. It is truly a work of art. The gameplay too is magnificent. Absolutely amazing. I recommend this to everyone. Buy it now!!
If you like cities that float in the sky, this game is for you.
One of the best story lines it have every heard before!! Also has really good graphics.

**Uncompleted with the game**

A game where the story becomes the selling point and not its game mechanics.
You think that they would have improved from the clunky animations, ai navigation and combat of Bioshock. Only to realize that in all three points much hasn't changed.
If these same game mechanics were in any other game with a weak story the game would have been mediocre at best.

I am still enjoying it but feel that the game mechanics/gameplay let it down.

Do not recommend.
Very short, unfulfilling, predictable story.
Despite only paying $27 for it, I still felt robbed of a larger sum of money.

Just play the original Bioshock against on a harder difficulty or something.
Wait a minute that card.

Wow. Just a plain 'ol-simple OMFG WOWWWWWW.
I played the first 2 and loved em, but this one tops them both by millions.
GREAT story. Great combat. Great atosphere and msic. Simply-great EVERYTHING.
A MUST OWN, even if you didnt play the first 2 games.
GET IT, LOVE IT.

Side note- buy the season pass, seeing as the first real DLC "Burial at Sea"  is only around 2hrs and costs 5$ less than the whole season pass.
--
Not trying to spoil or anthing, but "Burial at Sea" DLC was a GREAT(yet short) trip back to the city of pre-messed up Rapture. They did a superb job. Loved every bit of it, and yes, even the surprise+twist ending of P1. Fits/makes the most sense  if you've played thru Infinite in it's entirety.

One of the most worthy DLC add ons I've ever come across(I paidfor Season Pass for 20$, sad to see ppl who didn't/had to pay 15$ JUST for "Burial at Sea p1". 
A bit tooo much for what it was IMO. 
Although I'm sure devs had to "mostly" re-create Rapture, so I understand that took a decent amount of work work, and I express my love for them doing so and doing it extremely well. 
Still worth the 20$ season pass, and even the 15$ "Burial at Sea" stand-alone-DLC.
Also the "Burial at Sea p2" is anoher fantastic DLC.

"As the months and years turned to memories, so did the men of Congress turn to righteousness. And through the technology of men, the dollars of Washington, the Lord worked his will upon Columbia and raised her high above the Sodom below."

You must play this game.

I played it elsewhere, now I have it on steam and plan to play it again! 

Angry Joe's Bioshock Infinite Review-
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g15hfTHNdTg

Watch that, and if you still don't want to play this game, you're really missing out.
Great game! I hated the first two, but this one grabbed me and kept me playing till the end.
Simply perfect

Fantástico ou _ _ _  _ _ _ _ _! Uma dessas duas palavras você usará no final do jogo. Bioshiock Infinite é um jogaço em tudo, mas principalmente em sua trama. No inicio parece um jogo qualquer mas tudo muda quando você conhece Elizabeth. A medida que você  vai jogando vai batendo uma ansiedade em buscas de respostas. Claro que não vou falar o que acontece no final seria um spoiler estupido, mas não era o que eu esperava nem de longe! No bom sentido, claro. Foi surpreendente? Sim, foi!  Depois que você termina o jogo, você para e fica pensativo tentando encaixar as coisas e é aí que tudo faz sentido! Enfim, simplesmente épico! 

Agora um conselho, espere terminar os créditos porque ainda tem uma cena final que fecha com chave de ouro!

10/10 

Eu não vou me surpreeder se levar o GOTY, pra mim já é, e com um final nunca visto antes em um jogo!

Ураганный шутер. Весьма необычный геймплей. До мелочей продуманный сюжет. Приятная графика. Потрясающий саундтрек. Превосходный дизайн локаций. Это и многое другое...
Но главные слова характеризующие игру: утопия, тлен, бесконечность. 
Тут больше нечего говорить - запускай и играй!
10/10.
as a sequel, it is an okay game. much less jumping and climbing than the first game, but overall id say assassins creed 2 is pretty fun. I don't know why altair can't jump no more tho lol :(.
one of the best games ever.
Incredible story and atmosphere. Pretty good shooter, though not as good as its predecessors.

This isn't a game, its an Experience.  Heaping more praise on this game than the critics and other fans already have is almost redundant, but I feel compelled to acknowledge such an amazing achievement and urge everyone I know to give this a try your investment of money and time will be richly rewarded.
One of the most incredible games I've ever played. It would be criminal negligence most foul for you to not play this game to its conclusion.
Wow.....Love this game.....Great story...great graphics..this is the way a FPS should play
Awesome game. Great ending if you dont cheat and google it... semi-replayable
This is a good game. The main draw it the story. It will blow your mind.

+ Story

+ Not just a FPS, feels like a true experience

If you don't play this, you're doing yourself a massive disservice. A++

Like, seriously. I've never been this blown away with a game ever. Just, wow.
JUST AMAZING
Ан-факинг-беливбл.
Overall disappointing compared to previous Bioshock games.

Juegazo de 10... con una historia que hace ver las superproducciones que vemos de Hollywood como una mala película tipo B.

Simplemente APOTEOSICO!!!

Recomendado totalmente...
Perfecte game gewoon! Is soms teveel van het schieten, maar qua verhaal echt heel erg leuk! Mijn favoriet op de pc

One of the best games ever made.
The graphics are amazing and gameplay is also very good. 
But the best part of this game is it's story line.

Buy it!
Шедевр! Ну, просто, ШЕДЕВР!!! 10 из 10! НО! Я честно признаюсь, что мне по душе 1 часть лучше, не знаю по чему, но на вкус и цвет...

Probably one of the best singleplayer stories second to only The Last of Us in my book. Still doesn't change the fact I'm still so freaken confused at the ending, but all that aside it is one of those games everyone should have played at some point in their life. If you haven't played it PLAY IT!!!

A very pretty game, in an interesting and intruging atmosphere, but with problems.  The combat feels non-stop, the characters do things that will make you question the writing, and most of all it is a poor representation of the horror/creepy enviroments that were bioshock 1-2 and system shock.  A decent game, but not one I would go out of my way to advise someone to play.

oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god oh my god

Come dive in and get lost in the storyline of Bioshock: Infinite. The writing, voice acting, and MC are done so well you truly get drawn in and connected to these characters. I cried at the ending. Oh, and the gameplay is good, too.
Great Storyline. Great Combat. My favorite in the BioShock series. This is my GOTY for the Decade. Best Single-player game ever!
On ne peut pas passer à coté de ce jeu qui est tout simplement énorme.

Можно полноценно сказать что это шедевр и эта игра обязательна к прохождению всем тем кто хоть немного любит жанр action. Отличный сюжет который запутан, но тем не менее хорошо подан разработчиками (давненько я такого не видел). 

Персонаж Элизабет это вообще отдельная тема, мало того что она очень обаятельная, так она "живая", создается даже некое впечатление что играешь в кооперативе. Отличный звук с хорошим позиционированием (объемностью) не у каждой игры оно хорошее. Графика тоже на уровне. Ни одного бага и ни одного вылета за всю игру, это отлично. Отличная механика и геймплей. Хорошо продуманная концовка которая гарантированно вас удивит и оставит под впечатлением (Кстати после титров будет продолжение кому интересно посмотрите). 

Когда все вокруг очень хорошо отзывались об этой игре я не понимал, не верил, что, не ужели игра так хороша ? Да я убедился в этом!

[quote]Моя оценка 10/10.[/quote]

It took me awhile to finally play through this, despite having pre-ordered it, due to the save system they chose to put in (which is still the worst aspect of the game by a mile). However, once I decided to finally just get past the checkpoint system and play the game, I was rewarded with one of the most gripping stories and emotionally complex characters I've ever seen in a game. While there are things from the first Bioshock I feel are superior (save system, hacking minigame, more than 2 weapon slots), Infinite's story and atmosphere are stellar. It also has probably the best ending I've ever seen in a video game. The writing completely redeems any issues I had with the game, and it is the finest experience I've had this year.
One of THE best stories in a game ever. A must play if you haven't already.
Очень красивые виды, интересная история. Но жанр экшн, как-то для меня коряво лёг.
the best game ive played in awhile 10/10

Bioshock Infinite is my favorite game ever. Why? Because I love stories and this has to be the best one I have ever seen in a game. It's INCREDIBLE. Great relationship between protagonist and it's sidekick, which is something that became a trend now a days, but that's not all of course. It's full of great moments, it has an amazing original universe unlike any other game and THE ENDING DUDE HOLY F*CK. Gameplay wise it's pretty solid although kind of repetitive, anyways it's another masterpiece by Ken Levine. 10 out of 10.

Отличное произведение!

Amazing Game

Edited for sake of readers sanity.

I've heard people say this game is extremely dissapointing when compared to the first Bioshock. But you should really play the game for what it is, rather for what it isn't. It's got some great characters, a beautiful world and one of gamings greatest endings (IMPO). The shooting is a bit lackluster. But if you can get past that, you won't be dissapointed.

This is an incredible game , the graphics arnt as detailed as some titles eg tomb raider, having said that it is a visually STUNNING! game, i have never seen such a comprehansive and retina burning set of visuals .Fantastic fun to play, although a little linear and as for the storyline WTF,perhaps my tired old brain was seared by the visuals because I didnt have a clue what was going on! that said incredible game and caught on a weekend deal for only £11.49, well worth it
awesome story, awesome graphics, just a good game !!!
